column1: Mihona is a town and a Nagar Panchayat in Bhind district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh.
Mihona is located at 26.28°N 78.98°E﻿ / 26.28; 78.98. It has an average elevation of 154 metres (505 feet).

column3: 799. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Mihona has an average literacy rate of 65%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 74%
column5: and female literacy is 55%. In Mihona
column6: 15% of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: The civic administration of the town is managed by the Mihona Nagar Panchayat and the town is divided into 15 wards.
